title: Exquisite Diamond Emerald Ruby Kasulaperu Haaram with Jhumka Set
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish
features: This Haaram features a modern interpretation of the classic Kasulaperu design. The necklace is intricately designed with diamond-studded floral and paisley motifs. A captivating emerald center pendant gives way to a larger diamond-encrusted pendant with a ruby center and pearl drops. The Jhumkas echo this design with rubies, diamonds, and pearls. This piece embodies a modern design with traditional South Indian essence.
colors: and creamy white (pearls). This creates a rich and vibrant color palette befitting traditional South Indian jewelry.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Its modern design also makes it suitable for upscale contemporary events.
description: This Haaram set showcases exceptional craftsmanship, blending traditional Kasulaperu design with modern aesthetic sensibilities. The use of high-quality diamonds, a natural emerald, and a genuine ruby, combined with Hyderabadi gold polish, ensures both lasting beauty and value. A true heirloom piece that embodies cultural significance with a modern touch. The brilliance of the diamonds offers unparalleled radiance.
